name: Poppy Seed Chicken Pasta Salad
author: lee jean
summary: My boyfriend is not a fan of pasta salads and he couldn't get enough of it! You can omit the pasta and place salad on sandwich roll or bread for a yummy chicken salad sandwich.
ingredients: ½ cup poppy seed salad dressing
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook pasta in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 12 minutes; drain, rinse in cold water, and drain again
Toss pasta, chicken, onion, cranberries, celery, and almonds together in a salad bowl; drizzle with poppy seed dressing and stir to coat
